data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Shuwan, Han, Mengqi, Li, Xiaojie, Li, Zhenyu, Xiang, Xiaoguo (2018): Hemiboeasuiyangensis (Gesneriaceae): a new species from Guizhou, China. PhytoKeys 99: 99-106, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.99.25265, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.99.25265
